testcase.name: DBA.TM18
testcase.description: DBA.TM18: ReportingPeriodStartDate with either no dimensionality or the dimension of TypeOfReportingPeriodDimension:AllReportingPeriodsMember must only be tagged once.

variation.name: Invalid
variation.description: ReportingPeriodStartDate appears twice, one with no dimensionality the other with the dimension of TypeOfReportingPeriodDimension:AllReportingPeriodsMember
